titleStmt.title: John W. Cardwell to Beriah Magoffin et al.
CWG12046

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)

body.p:
Harrodsburg Ky
4th June 1861
Gov. Magoffin S. Gill Dr Peyton Geo. T. Woods & Genl Dudley
Com of Ky for Destributing Arms
Gent

Refering you to accompanying Certficate of Presiding Judge showing that we have organized under recent act of Asembly. I make application for 100 stand of arms and &C, & would like to have the Minnis rifle if on hand.
Please give my application a favourable Consideration
Please let me be informed of your decesion

Very Respy
J. W. Cardwell
Capt. Home Guard.
Harrodsburg
Ky
My Company will soon reach 100 men
